attributes.action: Give Parliament a vote on Brexit
attributes.additional_details:
As a BILL(May's proposals of implementing EU laws) is ridiculous, Parliament should have a say.

The Government, including our current administration cannot handle Brexit.


They have got no idea of what the European Union is and have no plan.

They would basically betray the people's will as leave voters are stereotyped as racist twats. 

The will of the people is to look after those in need, not to exclude ourselves and commit suicide or follow even deluded ideas.

The people want change.
attributes.background:
On 23rd June 2016 the United Kingdom voted to leave the European Union in a referendum provided for by an Act of Parliament. We are committed to implementing the democratic outcome of the referendum.
What the Government does not know is that this is a constitutional democracy, not a fake democracy.
